_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Make Your Smart Home a Reality

instruction.en: Press and hold the reset button until the red light is on, and then release button.
At the same time, hold down both the '1' and '2' buttons until you hear the 'beep' sound, and then release them.

Reset device by continuously power off and on 5 times. After resetting, confirm the warm white, cold white, red, green, and blue lights change in sequence for a total of 3 seconds and then the warm white light remains on.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is blinking.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is blinking.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is solid, then release.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is blinking.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is solid, then release.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is on.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is blinking.
Hold Matter + Pause + Esc/Space for 5 seconds until the ESC key's LED blinks blue.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is solid, then release.
Press and hold the reset button until the three indicator lights flash and then release it.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is on, and then release button.

Press and hold the + button for 10 seconds to factory reset the sensor.
Confirm the sensitivity indicator is flashing rapidly.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is on.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is blinking.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is solid, then release.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is blinking.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is blinking.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light appears.
Long press the reset button until the red light comes on, and the blue light flashes when you release the button.
Long press the reset button until the red light comes on, and the blue light flashes when you release the button.
push the button until the LED turns blue, keep on pushing until it turns in blue blinking.
Press and hold the reset button until cloud pattern flickers on the screen.
Press and hold the reset button until cloud pattern flickers on the screen.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is on, and then release button.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is solid, then release.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light is blinking.
Press and hold the reset button until the red light appears.
Long press the Start/Stop button until the red light comes on, and the blue light flashes when you release the button.
